text: Brazilian Nationals Jiu-Jitsu No-Gi Championship is a no-gi Brazilian Jiu- Jitsu (BJJ) tournament hosted annually by the CBJJ since 2009 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. ==Men's champions== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 90%" |- !
